channel.title: Whens the age barrier
channel.description:
What age is it right to start cheating and what age should you end it.
Say if your 30 or so,i reckon you should have quit a while ago.Same as if your 12 you shouldnt start till 14.
Opinions?

item.title: Whens the age barrier
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

kaitnieks was old enough to stop playing, he had a kid, maybe the 40+ year olds that play dont have kids and want to feel like they do >.<
i unno…
i dont supose their really is an age barrier…

Read full topic

item.title: Whens the age barrier
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Fakawi is over 40 years old and he’s a great person to the SRL Community. There should be no barrier at all in my opinion (If it was inquired). It’s like saying when you should start and stop using the internet, in a way …

Read full topic

item.title: Whens the age barrier
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

Runescape isnt a kids game. This is made obvious by the fact that the minimum age you are supposed to be in order to play is 13, as they cannot guarantee your online safety. There are lots of people well over 30 who play runescape. You can say the exact same thing for any game.

Read full topic

item.title: Whens the age barrier
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:3, topic:18536”]Yes,but you must think of it as:

[quote]
A 30 year old cheating in some kids game.
[/quote][/quote]
Honestly, who cares about what others think? Just ignore what people say.

Read full topic

item.title: Whens the age barrier
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Yes,but you must think of it as:

A 30 year old cheating in some kids game.

Read full topic

item.title: Whens the age barrier
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

It all depends on whatever your interests and skill levels are. If you are good at programming and thinking, no matter what your age is, you are more than entitled to cheat, because you know what you are doing. 30 isnt really that old, and if you were into cheating at that age, chances are you have a hell of a lot of experience with computers, so could be one of the best cheaters in the scene.

Read full topic
